Package com.jml.optimizers

package com.jml.optimizers
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Adam
    The Adam (Adaptive Moment Estimation) optimizer.
    ExponentialDecay
    ExponentialDecay is a Scheduler that decays the learning rate exponentially.

    The following update rule is applied by the ExponentialDecay Scheduler.
    GradientDescent
    Vanilla gradient descent optimizer.
    Momentum
    The momentum based gradient descent optimizer.
    Optimizer
    Interface for an optimizer which can be used to minimize a function by utilizing the gradients of that function.
    Scheduler
    Learning rate scheduler for optimizers.
    StepLearningRate
    StepLearningRate is a Scheduler which "steps" the learning rate at regular intervals during optimization.
    StepOnPlateau
    StepOnPlateau is a Scheduler which "steps" the learning rate whenever the loss stops significantly decreasing for a specified number of epochs.

    The step is computed by a factor.
    TimeDecay
    TimeDecay is a Scheduler that decays the learning rate through time.
